      • getCurrentProgram

      • getHelpMessageFor

        java.lang.String getHelpMessageFor(java.lang.Object obj)
        Returns the help message derived from the given type
        Parameters:
        obj - the object or type of the command line shell
        Returns:
        the help message derived from the given type

      • getRawArgs

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRawArgs()
        Returns:
        the raw string arguments a Gosu program was started with

      • initialize

        boolean initialize(java.lang.Object obj,
                 boolean exitOnBadArgs)
        Initializes the properties on the given object based on the command line arguments. If the object passed in is a type, static properties will be initialized.

        Note that you will get -h, -help and --help for free, there is no need to explicitly include a help property on your command line class.

        Parameters:
        obj - the class to initialize from the passed in arguments
        exitOnBadArgs - if true is passed in and the arguments incorrectly map to the given type, a help message will be printed and the JVM will exit with a -1 return value, otherwise a false value will be returned
        Returns:
        true if initialization was successful

      • initialize

        void initialize(IType commandLineShell)
        Initializes the static properties on the given type based on the command line arguments. If the arguments incorrectly map to the given type, a help message will be printed and the JVM will exit with a -1 return value.
        Parameters:
        commandLineShell - the class to initialize from the passed in arguments

      • isUseTerminalWidth

        boolean isUseTerminalWidth()
        Returns:
        true if CommandLineAccess will attempt to use the active terminals width when printing it's help message

      • setCurrentProgram

        void setCurrentProgram(java.io.File currentProgram)
        Parameters:
        currentProgram - - the currently executing program

      • setExitEnabled

        void setExitEnabled(boolean boolean)
        Parameters:
        boolean - boolean

      • setRawArgs

        Parameters:
        args - the args to a Gosu program

      • setUseTerminalWidth

        void setUseTerminalWidth(boolean b)
        Set to true for CommandLineAccess to use the active terminals width when printing it's help message
        Parameters:
        b -

      • showHelp

        void showHelp(IType obj)
        Shows a help message for the program arguments derived from the given type, sent to stdout
        Parameters:
        obj - either the type of the command line shell if static properties are used, or the instance if instance properties are used

      • showHelp

        void showHelp(java.lang.String programName,
            java.lang.Object obj)
        Shows a help message for the program arguments derived from the given type, sent to stdout
        Parameters:
        programName - the name of the program
        obj - either the type of the command line shell if static properties are used, or the instance if instance properties are used
